bin/hash.c

00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Hash testing
00003  *
00004  * Tests hashing functions.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include <cmph.h>
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 
00012 /* Global variables */
00013 char *program_name;             /**< Program name */
00014 char *input_file = NULL;        /**< Given input TSPLIB file */
00015 int supress_hash = ARROW_FALSE;
00016 
00017 /* Program options */
00018 #define NUM_OPTS 2
00019 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00020 {
00021     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00022         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00023     {'H', "supress-hash", "do not create hash table",
00024         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_hash, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE}
00025 };
00026 char *desc = "Tests the hashing functions.";
00027 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp";
00028 
00029 /* Main Method */
00030 int 
00031 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00032 {   
00033     int i;
00034     arrow_problem problem;
00035     arrow_problem_info info;
00036     
00037     /* Read program arguments */
00038     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00039         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00040     
00041     /* Try and read the problem file and its info */
00042     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00043         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00044     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, !supress_hash, &info))
00045         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00046     
00047     /* Check to make sure the hash table is working properly */
00048     if(info.hash.num_keys > 0)
00049     {
00050         for(i = 0; i < info.cost_list_length; i++)
00051         {
00052             int cost = info.cost_list[i];
00053             unsigned int k = arrow_hash_search(&(info.hash), cost);
00054             printf("%d\t%d\t%s\t%d\n", i, cost, info.hash.vector[i], k);
00055         }
00056         printf("\n");
00057     }
00058     else
00059     {
00060         printf("Hash table not created as per user option.\n");
00061     }
00062         
00063     /* Free up the structures */
00064     arrow_problem_info_destruct(&info);
00065     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00066     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00067 }
